text.jpText:
春のマイル王を決める『安田記念』の当日は、
あいにくの大雨に見舞われた。
text.enText:
On the day of the "Yasuda Kinen," a race to 
decide the king of the spring mile, it 
unfortunately rained heavily.

text.jpText:
これほどの道悪では、いかにタイキシャトル
と言えど勝つことは難しいのではないか、と
観客たちの間に不安が広がる。
text.enText:
The crowd was concerned that it would be 
difficult for even the TAIKI SHUTTLE to win 
on such a bad road. The spectators were 
concerned that it would be difficult to win 
the race, no matter how bad the roads were.

text.jpText:
そんな中、タイキシャトルは
雨にも負けない熱い気持ちを胸に抱いていた。
text.enText:
In the midst of all this, Taiki 
Shattle held on to its passion in 
its heart, even in the rain.

text.jpText:
雨であろうと、最高に力強い走りを見せて
観客をエキサイトさせるのだと、
悪天候のレースに臨んでいった！
text.enText:
She was determined to thrill the crowd with 
her most powerful performance, even in the 
rain. She went into the race in bad weather!
